summary:
- Changed the color of the Dragonplate armor to very light grey.
- Removed the shoulder bones (Similar to the different steel armor models) (Also have version with shoulders)
- Removed the bones from the rear.
- It integrates another mod which also adds a face mask to the helmet and fixes the clipping issues
descriptionHtml:
I retextured the dragonplate armor to be less bulky and look better, I hope :)

- Changed the color of the Dragonplate armor to very light grey.
- Removed the shoulder bones (Similar to the different steel armor models)
- Removed the bones from the rear
- It integrates another mod which also adds a face mask to the helmet and fixes the clipping issues.

If you don't want the face mask, download the no mask meshes from the original mod and replace them manually or with NMM. that should install the no-mask version and therefore remove the mask.

I still consider the no shoulders version a bit of a beta mod, since there are some small leftover textures which i couldn't remove. Anyone is free to edit them out and contact me to upload them.

[size="5"]Note[/size]
Added a version Dragonplate armor recoloured - with shoulders (same as the other but with shoulders)

Added a version with default color and removed shoulders

I hope you like and endorse :)


[size="5"]Credits:[/size]
Dragonplate Helmet Fix and Alternate Masked Version (by Shodan44)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7084&navtag=file/images.php%3fid=7084&tab=3
He didn't ask for credits, but i simply can't not credit such a useful mod :)
author: 92DemonKing
